availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Larkin S. Berry (Union County, KY, merchant)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Mahala Ann Hopgood Berry in Union County, Kentucky, on September 17, 1838. Father of John S. Berry, George H. Berry, M. A. Berry, Daniel H. Berry, Richard C. Berry, William A. Berry, Peter G. Berry, Juliet T. Berry, Cassie Berry, Ura E. Berry, and Mahala C. Berry. Carpenter in Union County in 1850. Merchant in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, District 1, p. 457A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Morganfield, p. 529.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Morganfield, p. 347B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Union County Marriages, Film 000562196, p. 87.
